mapper.select: SELECT bc.id,bc.blog_id,bc.creator_id,bc.comment_content,bc.like_count,bc.create_time, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM blog_comment_like_user WHERE comment_id=bc.id and user_id=#{userId} and status=1)isLikeByCurrentUser FROM blog_comment bc WHERE blog_id=#{blogId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time
